title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.5 - Cargo, definition of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.5 - Cargo, definition of

State Regulations
(a) All merchandise, goods, articles, or whatever is transported or to be
transported by watercraft. (b) Cargo
shall be placed only in or upon areas designated for that purpose by the Port

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1243.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
